title: Solana Twitter Clone
description: A twitter clone built on the Solana blockchain

title: NFT Marketplace on Ethereum
description: An Ethereum NFT marketplace with 1155 Solidity smart contract and Metamask integration

title: PancakeSwap Clone
description: I forked PancakeSwap front and backend and deployed it on Heroku for a client.  The DEX contracts as well as the dividend paying ERC20 contracts I created in solidity were deployed to a private blockchain.

title: Crypto Trading for Own Account
description: I created multipled trading bots for Centralized and Decentalized Crypo Exchanges and profitably executed millions of crypto trades over 10 exchanges

title: VScode extension for Foundry for startup in San Francisco
description: I created a vscode extension for a startup in San Francisco that wrapped Foundry functionality

title: NFT Trading Bot for Client
description: I made an OpenSea trading bot for a client that traded NFTs on the OpenSea marketplace

title: Tokenomics ERC20 Smart Contract for Client
description: Created tokenomics ERC20 Smart contract for client with taxes on transfers and reflections

title: EVM Debugger in C++
description: I modified an EVM to get more debugging infomation than is presented in Foundry or Hardhat

title: Trading bot with MERN stack admin panel
description: Trading bot deployed on Heroku with an Admin panel to control the bot behavior using MERN stack
